info.description:
## Endpoints

Endpoints are authenticated using the Bearer authorization scheme, using the
REDO_API_SECRET.

```txt
GET /v2.2/resource HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Bearer 77bb7598b7a972475cc7c7e171ec33af
Host: api.getredo.com
```

## Webhooks

Webhooks are authenticated using the Bearer authorization scheme, using
a secret supplied by the subscriber.

```txt
POST /events HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Bearer subscriberauth123
Host: subscriber.example.com
```

Webhook events are delivered in order for each individual subject (e.g.
return).

If the response is not a 2xx status code, the event will be retried multiple
times before discarding it.
info.title: Redo API

get.description: Get an invoice as a CSV.
Get an invoice as a CSV.

post.description:
**BETA**: This endpoint is in beta and subject to change.

Trigger processing of a return with specified products.

customerNotes.description: Notes to send to customer. These can be rejection notes or processing notes.

products.description: Array of products to process or reject

_id.description: Product ID found on the return

processInput.description: Processing details. You may only have one of reject or processInput.

newMerchantAdjustment.description: Adjustment amount. This will be the amount that is credited to the customer, overriding the original product value.

reject.description: Reject this product. You may only have one of reject or processInput.

examples: Successfully prepared some products to be processed, once all products are ready, processing will be triggered

Create webhook for store. Or if webhook already exists with `externalId`, update it.

2xx.description: Success. Return a 2xx status code to indicate success.

default.description: Error. The event will be retried multiple times and then discarded.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies this problem.

title.description: Human-readable summary of the problem type.
title.title: Title

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

externalId.description: Product ID in external system (e.g. shopify).
externalId.title: External ID

discounts.description: The total amount discounted on the order before returns. This includes both order and line level discounts.
discounts.title: Discounts

fulfillmentLocationId.description: ID of the location where the item was be fulfilled.

lineItemsTotal.description: Total price of all line items before discounts, shipping, and taxes.
lineItemsTotal.title: Line Items Total

shippingCost.description: The total shipping cost for the order. This includes fees and any related discounts that were refunded.
shippingCost.title: Shipping Cost

taxes.description: Total taxes applied to the order.
taxes.title: Taxes

total.description: The total price of the order, before returns. This includes taxes, discounts, and shipping costs.
total.title: Total

return-status.schema.description:
Return status.

* open: Return has been approved and is awaiting shipment.
* in_transit: Return shipment is in transit.
* delivered: Return shipment has been delivered and awaiting processing.
* needs_review: Return requires review before further action.
* in_review: Return is currently being reviewed.
* complete: The return has been completed successfully.
* rejected: The return has been rejected.
* flagged: A problem with return processing requires merchant action.
* pre_shipment: Return requires pre-shipment merchant authorization.
* deleted: The return has been deleted (Reset).
return-status.schema.title: Return status

mailingAddress.description: Mailing address to send the returned items.
mailingAddress.title: Mailing address

itemCount.description: Total quantity of all exchange items

originalPrice.description: Original price for the exchange item without discounts and taxes

price.description: Subtotal price for the exchange item including discounts

externalOrderIds.description: Array of external order IDs associated with this return
externalOrderIds.title: External Order IDs

internalCreatedByName.description: Name of the internal team member who created this return
internalCreatedByName.title: Internal Created By Name

exchangeItem.description: Exchange item details if this return item is being exchanged
exchangeItem.title: Exchange item

greenReturn.description: Whether this is a green return (no physical return required)

id.description: Line item reference ID in format: {orderId}/{lineItemIndex}
id.title: ID

notes.description: Teammembers generated notes and comments on the return

image.description: Optional image URL attached to the note
image.title: Image URL

notes.title: Notes

shipments.description: Array of all shipments associated with this return
shipments.title: Shipments

shopifyOrderIds.description: Array of Shopify order IDs (deprecated, use externalOrderIds)
shopifyOrderIds.title: Shopify Order IDs

mailingAddress.description: Mailing address returned items are sent from.
mailingAddress.title: Mailing address

charge.description: The upsell amount for the exchange order

exchange.description: Total value of new items in exchange

comment.schema.description: Comment with either message or image.
comment.schema.title: Comment

return-status-update.schema.description:
Return status.

* complete: The return has been completed successfully.
* open: Return has been approved and is awaiting shipment.
* flagged: A problem with return processing requires merchant action.
* rejected: The return has been rejected.
* deleted: The return has been reset.
return-status-update.schema.title: Return status

discountAmount.description: The amount this coupon discounts in dollars for this line item.

charge.description: The charge that the invoice is for.

createdAt.description: The time the invoice was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the invoice was last updated.

shipping-weight.schema.description: Weight measurement with unit for shipping.
shipping-weight.schema.title: Shipping Weight

documents.description: Available shipping documents. You can access these documents using the GET Shipment document endpoint.
documents.title: Documents

id.description: ID for the carrier account that provides the shipping rate.
id.title: Carrier Account ID

storefront-event.schema.description: Shopify pixel event for storefront tracking.

anonymousId.description: Anonymous identifier for users without account.

cartLine.description: Information about specific cart line item.

eventName.description: Name of the Shopify pixel event.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred.

urlWithParams.description: Complete page URL with query parameters.

storefront-event.schema.title: Storefront Event

callback.description: HTTPS callback URL to POST events.
callback.title: Callback
